t: Hitachi Power Tools is Now Metabo HPT | Pro Tool Reviews
s: October 1, 2024 - Shortly after, investment firm KKR purchased the power tool division of Hitachi. Later in 2022, Metabo HPT and Metabo merged to form a single power tool company. While rebranding is always news, it usually doesn’t come with such a big break from the original brand name.
